content.body: zcorpan: Or actually, not just lowercase but case-insensitive for the standard `Shift_JIS` — also (case-insensitive) `shift-jis`
content.formatted_body: zcorpan: Or actually, not just lowercase but case-insensitive for the standard Shift_JIS — also (case-insensitive) shift-jis

content.body: Do you have a REGEXP handy? I checked "<meta[^>]+(charset|content)=\"shift[_-]jis\"" on response bodies in November, got 1333 out of 672M
content.formatted_body: Do you have a REGEXP handy? I checked "<meta[^>]+(charset|content)="shift[_-]jis"" on response bodies in November, got 1333 out of 672M

content.body: I guess the lowercase shift_jis is relatively rare. Maybe a Shift_JIS query would return a lot more hits
